title: Vliegen over Nederland in 1938, Deel-1. Flying over the Netherlands, Part-1 in 1938 in color!

sources.title: De Oldify Nederland Luchtopnamen Van Nederland Deel 1 Audio 1080p S Ai
sources.description: This is Part-1 of a highly interesting film that shows The Netherlands from the air more than 80 years ago in 1938. I tried to find the locations, but the new search engine in the Beeld En Geluid archives has made this almost an impossible task. Fortunately many viewers have now assisted in identifying most of the locations in this film, as shown in the timeline and in the CC captions. Only a few locations still need to be identified. If you can help then please leave a comment! From a historic perspective this film has a lot too offer because a lot has changed since 1938, due to destruction during World War II and many new developments. Part-2 of this film is here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=r12VNUYaRHc Timeline (draft) 00:00 Football fields from above: Gemeentelijk Sportpark Hilversum, tribune van Dudok 00:17 The city of 's Hertogenbosch 01:24 Flying over the Dutch country side 01:37 Philips factories at Eindhoven, Strijp-S 01:54 Lighting tower at Eindhoven 02:05 Stadionplein and Olympic Stadium at Amsterdam 02:31 The previous Haarlemmermeer Station 02:56 The city of Gouda with its city hall in the background 03.10 Onze Lieve Vrouwe toren (nick named "Lange Jan") tower in Amersfoort 03:25 City hall at Hilversum designed by Dudok 03:44 Roermond 04:00 Weir (stuw) North of Roermond in the river Maas 04:09 Combined Railway and road bridge at Venlo, destroyed in 1940 during WWII 04:16 Weir (stuw) at Venlo in the river Maas 04:29 (?) 05:00 Taking off from old Schiphol airport Amsterdam 05:25 Recreation with sailing boats on the Nieuwe Meer and Amsterdamse bos 05:45 The Olympic Stadium at Amsterdam 05:55 Zaandam (?) 05:58 River De Zaan 06:15 Wormerveer 06:55 Waagplein at Alkmaar (cheese market) 07:16 Den Helder, its naval base and old wharfe "Rijkswerf" 07:48 On the left "Wachtship" Hr. Ms. Koningin Emma der Nederlanden at Willemsoord, Den Helder 07:57 The Dutch coast line with its wave breakers 08:00 Noordduinen between Groote Keeten and Callantsoog 08:09 Nature reserve Zwanenwater 08:12 Approaching IJmuiden with its sea locks 08:22 The harbor arms at IJmuiden 08:38 The sea locks at IJmuiden 08:41 The high lighthouse at IJmuiden 08:46 The Vissershaven (fishermen's port) at IJmuiden 08:50 Approaching old Schiphol airport. The original B&W film has been motion-stabilized, A.I. enhanced and A.I. colorized. Source: Beeld En Geluid.
